metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11139 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper conditions check in the voltage modulation interface for some Intel(R) Xeon(R) Scalable Processors may allow a privileged user to potentially enable denial of service via local access. It was discovered that certain Intel Xeon processors did not properly restrict access to a voltage modulation interface. A local privileged attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

notes.Note: tyhicks> This issue only affects processors manufactured by Intel Kernel changes are not needed to mitigate this issue

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
